answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Gregory, 
Thank you for your great question! While I was unable to find programs that specifically reward employees for innovation and creativity I was able to find many programs related to pay for performance where innovation/creativity can be factored into a yearly evaluation. 
-icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/13259 "Administrative Services Merit and Bonus System Proposal" this document outlines a merit and bonus system which could be used to reward innovation.
-"Naperville Formal Bonus Program" is another bonus program that gives helpful specifics for each different kind of bonus. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/13252
-Here is a previously asked question about employee recognition policies with some very detailed answers http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21401
In addition to there documents there is a great presentation from the ICMA conference "Celebrating Success: Recognizing Municipal Employees" that shows different ways in which employees can be recognized for their good work. http://webapps.icma.org/conference_Handouts/handouts2013/09-23-13%20ICMA%20Motivating%20Municipal%20Employees%20Final.pdf
I hope you find these links and documents helpful!
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org
